criteria_list: Completeness: Check that all the questions have been answered.
Quality: Assess the clarity, coherence, and professionalism of the responses.
Relevance: Ensure that the answers directly address the questions posed in the RFP.
Feasibility: Evaluate whether the proposed solutions are practical and achievable within the given constraints.
Costs: Analyze the cost-effectiveness of the proposals. Also, analyze if costs are clear and well specified.
Value: Determine if the responses offer good value for money and align with the organization's goals.
